name: Chordio
long_description:
Chordio is a generative product design assistant that transforms text descriptions into designs, helping product development teams remove design bottlenecks.

For example, a product manager at a tech company uses Chordio to generate and evolve three options for a new feature concept, then iterate and align with the team on the design in a single workshop instead of over multiple sessions.
one_liner: Generative product design assistant for product development teams
